item.title: Active Directory Hardening Series - Part 1 – Disabling NTLMv1
item.description:
Active Directory Hardening Series - Part 1 – Disabling NTLMv1
Hello everyone, Jerry Devore back again after to along break from blogging to talk about Active Directory hardening. In my role at Microsoft, I have found every organization has room to improve when it comes to hardening Active Directory. Many times, customers are aware of issues but are afraid of unintended impacts if they make a change. In other words, organizations are getting stuck in the "analysis paralysis" stage. In this series my goal is to help you understand how to move forward with confidence by better understanding...
